REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2508 reute d f BC-RAYTECH-<RAY>-BUYS-WE 04-08 0049

TEXT.TITLE: RAYTECH <RAY> BUYS WEST GERMAN COMPANY
TEXT.BODY: Raytech Corp said it acquired <Raybestos Industrie-Produkte GmBH> for 7.5 mln dlrs. Raybestos, with manufacturing facilities in Radevormwald, West Germany, produces friction materials for use in clutch and braking applications. Reuter
